Due to Aliyun Drive's stringent concurre: Mar gheall ar shrianta comhuaineachta dian Aliyun Drive, d'fhágamar sioncrónú na leabhar agus na gclúdaigh ar lár. Íoslódáil na leabhair de láimh trí chliceáil orthu le do thoil
Aliyun Drive imposes strict limits on co: Cuireann Aliyun Drive teorainneacha dian ar íoslódálacha comhuaineacha. Moltar duit 10 soicind a fhanacht sula ndéanann tú iarracht íoslódáil arís.

Some S3 services are not compatible with: Níl roinnt seirbhísí S3 comhoiriúnach le timpeallachtaí brabhsálaí. Má bhíonn fadhbanna ceangail agat, féach ar dhoiciméadú oifigiúil an tsoláthraí seirbhíse le treoracha CORS a chumasú. Chomh maith leis sin, mar gheall ar shrianta slándála an bhrabhsálaí, ní mór an tseirbhís S3 a rochtain trí HTTPS nuair atá tú ag cuairt ar Koodo Reader trí HTTPS.

Enable this option to increase synchroni: Cumasaigh an rogha seo chun luas sioncrónaithe a mhéadú. Stórálfar agus sioncrónófar do dhul chun cinn léitheoireachta, nótaí, buaicphointí, leabharmharcanna agus sonraí léitheoireachta eile trí ár seirbhís néil; leanfaidh do leabhair agus do chlúdaigh ag sioncrónú trí do chuid foinsí sonraí. Only WebDAV service provided by Alist is: Ní thacaítear go díreach sa bhrabhsálaí ach leis an tseirbhís WebDAV a sholáthraíonn Alist; caithfidh seirbhísí WebDAV eile CORS a chumasú chun oibriú i gceart. Chomh maith leis sin, mar gheall ar shrianta slándála an bhrabhsálaí, ní mór an tseirbhís WebDAV a rochtain trí HTTPS nuair atá tú ag cuairt ar Koodo Reader trí HTTPS.
By default, Koodo Reader will automatica: De réir réamhshocraithe, sioncronaíonn Koodo Reader do shonraí go huathoibríoch nuair a osclaíonn tú an aip agus a fhágann tú léamh

In the future, we will introduce more me: Sa todhchaí, cuirfimid níos mó gnéithe eisiacha do bhaill ar fáil, lena n‑áirítear staitisticí léitheoireachta agus sioncrónú uathoibríoch do nótaí, do bhuaicphointí, do dhul chun cinn léitheoireachta agus do liostaí foclóra le hardáin cosúil le Notion, Obsidian, Logseq, Anki agus tuilleadh.

When a line of text is n times the size: Nuair is ionann méid líne téacs agus n‑uaire méid an téacs rialta, déileálfar leis mar theideal
Server path (Please first create this fo: Conair an fhreastalaí (Cruthaigh an fillteán seo de láimh ar dtús)
Automatically launch on system startup: Seol go huathoibríoch ar thosú an chórais
Language auto-detection may not be accur: B'fhéidir nach mbeidh braite teanga uathoibríoch cruinn. Bain triail as an teanga foinse a roghnú de láimh le do thoil
Image copied to clipboard: Cóipeáladh an íomhá chuig an ngearrthaisce
Disable auto scroll to next or previous: Díchumasaigh scrollú uathoibríoch chuig an chéad chaibidil eile nó roimhe seo
Díchumasaigh scrollú uathoibríoch chuig an chéad chaibidil eile nó roimhe seo nuair a shroichtear deireadh na caibidle reatha
To reduce storage usage, only the book m: Chun úsáid stórála a laghdú, ní íoslódáiltear ach meiteashonraí an leabhair de réir réamhshocraithe, agus ní íoslódáiltear comhaid leabhar. Tar éis an rogha seo a chumasú, íoslódálfar gach comhad leabhar le linn sioncrónaithe
Failed to open Google Picker: Theip ar Google Picker a oscailt
Main window will be maximized to fit the: Uasmhéadafar an phríomhfhuinneog chun an scáileán a líonadh ar thosú
Your Pro trial has expired, please renew: Tá do thriail Pro imithe in éag, athnuaigh í chun na gnéithe Pro a úsáid
This data source cannot be accessed from: Ní féidir an foinse sonraí seo a rochtain ón mbrabhsálaí mar gheall ar bheartas CORS. Athraigh go foinse sonraí eile nó soláthraí seirbhíse atá CORS‑chumasaithe le do thoil.
This data source cannot be accessed due: Ní féidir an foinse sonraí seo a rochtain mar gheall ar bheartas slándála an bhrabhsálaí. Athraigh go foinse sonraí eile nó soláthraí seirbhíse bunaithe ar HTTPS le do thoil.
Use file name as book title: Úsáid ainm an chomhaid mar theideal an leabhair
With the integration of popular cloud st: Le comhtháthú seirbhísí stórála néil coitianta, WebDAV, FTP, SFTP, SMB, Docker agus stóráil oibiachtaí, fanann do shonraí ar fad slán faoi do smacht
The 115 cloud is only recommended for VI: Ní mholtar an néal 115 ach do úsáideoirí VIP, mar tá sé beagnach neamh‑inúsáidte do úsáideoirí saor in aisce. Ina theannta sin, mar gheall ar shaincheisteanna API leis an néal 115, féadfaidh sioncrónú a bheith an‑mhall. Má éilíonn tú stóráil néil 115 a úsáid le haghaidh sioncrónaithe, moltar Koodo Sync a chumasú ag an am céanna, rud a fheabhsóidh luas sioncrónaithe go suntasach.
Request timed out, You may change the se: Chuaigh an t‑iarratas thar am. Féadfaidh tú réigiún an fhreastalaí a athrú go China chun an fhadhb ceangail i mórthír na Síne a réiteach. Téigh go Socruithe > Cuntas
Please add a data source in Setting-Sync: Cuir foinse sonraí leis i Setting‑Sync agus cúltaca le do thoil
Failed to read file, please refresh and: Theip ar léamh an chomhaid, athnuaigh agus tabhair rochtain ar an eolaire arís le do thoil
No files found in this folder: Níor aimsíodh comhaid sa fhillteán seo
Please make sure the email and code are: Cinntigh go bhfuil an ríomhphost agus an cód ceart le do thoil
If you didn't receive the verification c: Mura bhfuair tú an cód fíoraithe, seiceáil an fillteán turscair nó úsáid soláthraí ríomhphoist eile
In order to let you directly manage your: Chun ligean duit do shonraí a bhainistiú go díreach i Google Drive, tá an sean‑thócan Google Drive curtha ar ceal againn. Athúdaraithe Google Drive sna socruithe le do thoil. Stórálfar do shonraí nua i bhfréamh‑eolaire do Google Drive, agus is féidir leat iad a bhainistiú go díreach i gcomhéadan gréasáin Google Drive.
You have exhausted your daily free AI vo: You have exhausted your daily free AI voice character quota. Please purchase more quota to continue using this feature or wait until the quota resets. You can also use other TTS voices instead.
We have two server regions(Global and Ch: We have two server regions(Global and China). To change the server region, you need to log out first. Do you want to log out now?
To enjoy a faster and seamless synchroni: To enjoy a faster and seamless synchronization experience.
Your reading progress, notes, highlights: Your reading progress, notes, highlights, bookmarks, and other data will be stored and synced through our cloud service. Your books and covers will still be synced by your added data sources. To save you from repeatedly entering your data source credentials on new devices, your credentials will be encrypted and stored securely in our cloud too. You can disable this feature anytime in the settings.
Data in other devices is messed up, but: Data in other devices is messed up, but the data in this device is normal. You can reset the sync record in this device, delete the KoodoReader/config folder in the data source(Turn off Koodo Sync if necessary), and sync again. This should resolve the issue
Tasks failed after multiple retries, ple: Tasks failed after multiple retries, please check the network connection or reauthorize the data source in the settings
This data source already contains a libr: This data source already contains a library. If you need to merge local and cloud data, please turn off Koodo Sync and resync.
Overwrite the default text style in the: Overwrite the default text style in the book
Once the daily free quota is exhausted,: Once the daily free quota is exhausted, the system will begin deducting from your purchased quota. The character count is calculated as follows, each letter, and punctuation mark counts as one character.
You can also use the desktop app to avoi: You can also use the desktop app to avoid this issue.
Please select the books in the Google Dr: Please select the books in the Google Drive Picker
To delete your account, you need to use: To delete your account, you need to use the mobile app. After logging in, go to Settings → Account, and follow the instructions.
If you have purchased the code directly: If you have purchased the code directly from our website, please redeem with an account registered in global server region
If you have purchased the code from Taba: If you have purchased the code from Tabao store, please redeem with an account registered in Chinese server region
AI voice is only available for Pro users: AI voice is only available for Pro users, please upgrade to Pro to use this feature
Some of your books are currently not dow: Some of your books are currently not downloaded to the local. Changing the default sync option may lead to data loss. We recommend downloading all books to the local by turn on Auto download cloud books in the setting before changing the default sync option. Click 'OK' to proceed without downloading.
The default sync options in the local an: The default sync options in the local and cloud are inconsistent, please set the local default sync option to
Restoring from a snapshot will overwrite: Restoring from a snapshot will overwrite your current data. Are you sure you want to continue?
Each time you open Koodo Reader, it auto: Each time you open Koodo Reader, it automatically creates a snapshot of your library (excluding books and covers). You can use these snapshots to restore your library to a previous state. Please note that restoring from a snapshot will overwrite your current data
This code has already been used, if you: This code has already been used, if you have redeemed it before, there is no need to redeem it again. Just log in to same account to use Pro features
